articles.title: Francisco Guzmán
articles.contents:
Francisco Guzmán
          
          
          Home
          More about me
          Projects using R
          
          
          Miscellaneous
           
          ▾
          
          
          Applications with R
          Travels
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Contact Me
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            More about me
            Hello! I’m Francisco, a passionate graduate in Business
            Engineering from the University of Chile in 2021. After
            dedicating that year to saving, I decided to embark on an
            exciting adventure in February of the following year,
            landing in beautiful Portugal.
            My story in this land began as a volunteer
            in a hostel, and over time, I found my way working in the
            housekeeping area until October 2022. During this period, I
            had the opportunity to meet incredible people and gradually
            immerse myself in the rich Portuguese culture.
            In search of new challenges, I made the decision with a
            group of friends to move to Coímbra in October 2022, where I
            currently call home. Here, I took on the role of Customer
            Service Representative at Foundever for the Airbnb project,
            from December 2022 to October 2023.
            Now, with a stronger command of the language and greater
            stability in my new homeland, I have decided to embark on
            new horizons. My goal is to improve my quality of life and
            develop professionally.
            I am acutely aware of the challenges in demonstrating
            skills acquired from a foreign university. However, through
            this website, I hope to showcase not only some of the
            expertise I possess but, more importantly, my fervor for
            data. Join me on this digital journey as I navigate the
            intricacies of my experiences, skills, and a passion that
            transcends borders. Your presence here is truly
            appreciated!
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                       GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       Contact Me

Francisco Guzmán
          
          
          Home
          More about me
          Projects using R
          
          
          Miscellaneous
           
          ▾
          
          
          Applications with R
          Travels
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Contact Me
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            Welcome to my website! I’m Francisco, a data enthusiast
            embarking on my journey to secure my first professional
            experience as a data analyst. In this space, I’ll be sharing
            the skills I’ve honed as I navigate the fascinating realm of
            data analysis. Join me on this exciting journey, where we’ll
            not only delve into data and trends but also explore aspects
            of my life, passions such as traveling, and experiences that
            have shaped my path. I invite you to explore my page and get
            to know more about me and my interests. I hope you enjoy the
            adventure as much as I do! Let’s discover the potential of
            data and a bit more about my life together!
            
            
            Education
            University of Chile | Santiago,
            Chile
            Business Engineering, BSc. in Economics | 2016 - 2021
            
            
            Experience
            Foundever (ex Sitel) | Customer Service
            Representative | December 2022 - October 2023 | Coímbra,
            Portugal
            Specialized in supporting the Airbnb project,
            specifically serving as a part of the resolution team.
            Handled various customer queries and issues with a focus on
            providing exceptional service and resolving concerns
            effectively
            Descontrair & Descansar Lda |
            Housekeeping cleaner | May 2022 - October 2022 | Faro,
            Portugal
            This role involved maintaining cleanliness and
            orderliness, ensuring a welcoming environment for guests,
            and adhering to high standards of hygiene and organization
            within the establishment.
            Servicio Nacional del Consumidor
            (SERNAC) | Intern in Management Control and Process
            Improvement Unit | July 2020 - February 2021 | Santiago,
            Chile
            Support in the review and validation of indicators,
            review and editing of Service documentation and permanent
            collaboration in the area of User Satisfaction, where we
            worked with Power BI.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                       GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       Contact Me
